title: tTorrent Pro - Torrent Client v1.4.1.1 Android
description:
tTorrent Pro - Torrent Client v1.4.1.1 Patched Proper
Requirements: ARM based devices, Android OS 2.1 and up
Overview: tTorrent is simply the best bittorrent client for Android based devices.
Image

Features:
- UNLIMITED DOWNLOAD SPEED!
- download single files from torrents with multiple files
- multiple torrent downloading, queuing
- search for torrents
- Wifi only mode, Wifi or WiMAX mode
- able to set Upload/Download speed in options
- web browser integration
- magnet link support
- trackerless torrent (DHT) support
- RSS support(automatically download torrents published in feeds)
- UPnP and NAT-PMP support
- IP filtering support
- proxy support(SOCKS, HTTP)
- encryption
- Local Peer Discovery
- creating torrents

What's New
v1.4.1.1: Fixed problem with magnet links and Chrome browser.
Changed notification icon to resemble the old one.
Fixed download speeds order, now it is upload, download speed everywhere.
When screen is off, the app continues downloading at full speed on all devices.
Attempt to fix rare licensing issues with Pro version.
Updated translations
